subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Yuri Foreman, the North American Boxing Federation light middleweight champion who is also studying to become an Orthodox rabbi, remained undefeated by unanimously outpointing Saul Román of Mexico in a dazzling 10-round title defense at Aviator Sports Complex in Brooklyn. Foreman (25-0) outboxed the plodding Román (24-5, 20 knockouts). The judges scored the bout in favor of Foreman, 98-92, 98-92, 97-93.
